column6: Howard proves yet again that he can't drive (spaceships). Peggy and the gang crash headlong into the Hydra-run gulag outpost just as a ragtag crew of Soviet scientists opens a portal between worlds! But it turns out they release an ancient terror searching for... his beloved?!
column8: | artist:Rich Ellis | writer:Kathryn Immonen | penciller (cover):Michael Komarck
